item.title: Steam Winter Sale 2025: Top 10 Deals You Can't Miss
item.description: The Steam Winter Sale is live with incredible discounts on AAA titles, indie gems, and VR games. Here are the best deals.

item.title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Breaks YouTube Records with 100M Views
item.description: Rockstar Games releases the second trailer for Grand Theft Auto VI, showcasing Vice City and breaking all viewership records within 24 hours.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Leaked Specs Reveal Major Upgrade
item.description: Leaked documents suggest Nintendo Switch 2 will feature 4K output, DLSS support, and backward compatibility with all Switch games.
